alert.note: Alert for Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Orange; Seminole; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 10:11PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Seminole, central Lake, northwestern Orange and central Volusia Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1010 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Eustis, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sanford, Apopka, Altamonte Springs, Winter Springs and DeLand. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. These types of funnel clouds are harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Orange; Seminole; Southern Lake County
